com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.script.security

Class Whitelist

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.script.security.Whitelist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GetLuaFacade

    public class Whitelist
extends java.lang.Object
implements GetLuaFacade
    Version:
    2/1/2018 Creates a Whitelist of allowed callable Methods that is unique to the caller and the method.
    Author:
    Stewart Charles

        public <T extends GetLuaFacade> Whitelist add(SecurityLevel securityLevel,
                                              T... args)
        Adds the argument elements Whitelists to the source Whitelist.

        securityLevel - The Security Level of the Whitelists to retrieve
        when calling the GetLuaFacade.getWhitlist function

        The source Whitelist

      • onWhitelist

        public boolean onWhitelist(java.lang.String bindId)
        Query if a specific id is in the source Whitelist
        Parameters:
        bindId - The String id to query
        Returns:
        True if found on the whitelist

      • onWhitelist

        public <T extends GetLuaFacade> boolean onWhitelist(T caller,
                                                    java.lang.reflect.Method m)
        Query if the given method is on the source Whitelist associated with the specified caller
        Type Parameters:
        T - A Type that implements GetLuaFacade
        Parameters:
        caller - The caller that invokes the specified method. Can be null if a static method.
        m - The target method.
        Returns:
        True if found on the whitelist

      • allow

        public void allow(org.luaj.vm2.Varargs varargs)
        Binding to Lua code that allows Authors to add things to the whitelist.
        
     -- Whitelists functions named up, down, left and right that belong to the player entity if found
     whitelist.allow(player, "up", "down", "left", "right")

     -- Whitelists all functions for the player entity
     whitelist.allow(player)
        Parameters:
        varargs -
